name: World of Artillery
description:
If you like war games, then you're definitely going to love this gun shooting game. World of Artillery is a historical artillery simulator with fierce tank battles. Shoot at troops, tanks, bunkers, and even cars! Destroy enemy tanks with cannons to defend your position or save a convoy of wounded. Assemble a complete collection of vintage guns!
Stunning graphics, exciting gameplay, and a wide range of recreated historical weapons and vehicles from different countries help you immerse yourself in the atmosphere of WWII!
